text: The Medical Association of Jamaica evolved from the British Medical Association Jamaica Branch which was constituted as the first overseas branch of the British Medical Association in 1877. It has over 2000 members, including students. The Association is celebrating its Golden Jubilee as an independent organisation in June 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Medical Association of Jamaica and Medical Association of Jamaica Insurance Fund Category:Medical associations based in Jamaica
title: Medical Association of Jamaica
